gw.testharness.v3

Class APICompatibleTestEnvironment

  • java.lang.Object
    • gw.testharness.v3.APICompatibleTestEnvironment

  • public class APICompatibleTestEnvironment
extends java.lang.Object
    This class exists to respond to the gw.testharness.v3.PLTestClass#getAPICompatibleTestEnvironment() method, which only exists for API compatibility with the old tests.
